* Model: Amilo SI 1520-5510
* Website: http://www.fujitsu-siemens.com/home/products/notebooks/amilo_si_1520.html

=== Current Issues ===
* Need 915resolution to have the good resolution. <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/63551|bug 63551]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/63560|bug 63560]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.17/+bug/63418|CPU soft lockup during bootup]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/gnome-applets/+bug/75165|GNOME volume applet doesn't work]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=384033|NetworkManager doesn't work with Ad-Hoc network]]</nowiki>
